Council_Bluffs.USS Hazard (AM-240):
USS Hazard (AM-240) was an Admirable-class minesweeper that served in the United States Navy during World War II.
Hazard was launched on 1 October 1944 and was commissioned on 30 December 1944. The vessel was built by the Winslow Marine Railway and Shipbuilding Company of Winslow, Washington. Hazard was fitted for both wire and acoustic sweeping and could double as an anti-submarine warfare platform.
